Cardiologist.title: Cardiologist
Cardiologist.description: Examines your heart and blood pressure.

Neurologist.title: Neurologist
Neurologist.description: Neurologists specialize in diagnosing, treating, and managing disorders of the brain, spinal cord, and peripheral nervous system.

Physiotherapist.title: Physiotherapist
Physiotherapist.description: Physiotherapists specialize in improving physical function, mobility, and overall well-being through exercises, manual therapy, and other non-invasive treatments.

InternalMedicine.title: Internal Medicine
InternalMedicine.description: Internal medicine physicians, also known as internists, specialize in the prevention, diagnosis, and treatment of adult illnesses and conditions.

Gynecologist.title: Gynecologist
Gynecologist.description: Gynecologists specialize in women's reproductive health, providing care for various conditions, performing surgeries, and supporting women through different life stages.
